input_text:
Job Title: Floating Food Service Support

Location: Chisago City, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Floating Food Service Support

Job Reference Number: 18507

Employment Type: Full-Time, OnsiteSegment: Corrections

Brand: Summit

State: Minnesota (US-MN)

The Role at a glance:

$750 sign on bonus

We are looking to add an experienced, skilled Floating Chef to our corrections team in Chisago City, MN. As a food service support, you will have the opportunity to help coordinate and prepare food for meal service in a variety of assigned locations.

What you'll be doing:

Assisting with planning, directing, organizing, and coordinating the activities of the food service department to provide outstanding dining options to each assigned unit. Helping to enforce company policies and procedures to provide administrative direction for menu formation; food preparation, distribution, and service; budgeting and purchasing; sanitation standards; safety practices; and staffing and staff development. Ensuring proper temperature, portioning, and quality of meals. Directly preparing meals as needed. Other tasks as assigned. 

What we're looking for:

Must-haves: 

At least two years’ experience in food service. Ability to travel up to 75% of the year. Strong leadership and communication skills. 

Nice-to-haves: 

At least one years’ experience in a supervisory role. Associate’s degree or higher. 

Pay:

$20.00 per hour

Our Benefits:

Medical (FT Employees)DentalVisionVoluntary UNUM offering for Accident, Critical Illness and Hospital IndemnityDiscount ProgramCommuter Benefits (Parking and Transit) EAP401kSick TimeHoliday Pay (9 paid holidays)Tuition Reimbursement (FT Employees)Paid Time Off 

#indeedelior

About Summit:

Focused on serving correctional institutions, Summit ensures that incarcerated people across the United States have access to delicious, healthy food at each meal. Working with Summit, you will have the opportunity to aid in this process and provide inmates with vital social interaction at mealtimes.

About Elior North America:

Elior North America is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. We are committed to diversity and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds and abilities. We take pride in supporting the development of our employees and their skills at all levels and in fostering an environment of growth.

At Elior North America, we are committed to offering growth and advancement opportunities for all of our employees. The valuable skills and experience you’ve gained with Elior will propel you further in your career, whether with our corporate office or one of our brand segments.

Disclaimer: This job description can be revised by management as needed.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Floating Food Service Support
output_json.summary: Experienced, skilled Floating Chef required for corrections team in Chisago City, MN.

Provide administrative direction for menu formation
Ensure proper temperature, portioning, and quality of meals
